testcase.classname: US_08 Password segment on Homepage should be editable
testcase.name: The old password should not be used
testcase.system-out: Given us08 user enters gmibank homepage.....................................passed Then us08 user clicks userEntry icon........................................passed Then us08 user clicks signIn link...........................................passed Then us08 user enters admin username "USER1"................................passed Then us08 user enters admin password "User123_".............................passed Then us08 user clicks signIn button.........................................passed Then user clicks password link..............................................passed Given user clicks password link and old password for three textbox "User123_".passed Then user doesn't save......................................................passed Then user signOut...........................................................passed
